english_example_sentence: My friend, you were going to follow a new and interesting project.
russian_example_sentence: Мой друг, ты собирался следить за новым и интересным проектом.
turkish_example_sentence: Arkadaşım, sen yeni ve ilginç bir projeyi takip edecektin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Arkadaşım, sen yeni ve ilginç bir projeyi ______.
